phrases.usage: Use this to tell someone the general size or condition.
phrases.example: My new apartment is very small but also very cozy.

phrases.usage: Use this to give your specific level in the building.
phrases.example: It is on the second floor near the main stairs.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe your building's location in the city.
phrases.example: It is near a busy supermarket and a quiet park.

phrases.usage: Use this to show exactly where your home is situated.
phrases.example: It is next to a large library and a bank.

phrases.usage: Use this to describe a specific part of your home.
phrases.example: The living room is quite large and has big windows.

phrases.usage: Use this to mention a feature your apartment has.
phrases.example: There is a small balcony with many beautiful green plants.

phrases.usage: Use this to help people find your apartment building's position.
phrases.example: It’s behind the old school in the center of town.

phrases.text: So it’s on the ... floor, right?
phrases.usage: Use this to confirm which level a person lives on.
phrases.example: So it’s on the fourth floor, right above the shop?

keyVocabulary.definition: Warm and comfortable in a nice way.
Having a lot of light from the sun.
Large and having a lot of room for things.
Not noisy and very peaceful for the residents.
New and looks like it was made recently.
